item.title: Comment on Sharing My Joy by Meaghan Lemon
item.dc:creator: Meaghan Lemon
item.description: Thank you for your kind words Hank! You are the best.
item.content:encoded: Thank you for your kind words Hank! You are the best.

item.title: Comment on Sharing My Joy by Hank Osmus
item.dc:creator: Hank Osmus
item.description:
I have known Meaghan my entire life, and throughout our time together, she has been one of the most creative and compassionate people that I have had the pleasure of knowing. Through her compassion, not only for others but for the Earth around her and the multitude of beautiful vegetation abound, she has been able to skillfully create some exquisite art with her floral designs.
I highly recommend Meaghan to anybody looking for a true artist to not only decorate their event(s), but to create living work of art that can be shared by your family and friends.
Kudos to Meaghan and her amazing work.
item.content:encoded:
I have known Meaghan my entire life, and throughout our time together, she has been one of the most creative and compassionate people that I have had the pleasure of knowing. Through her compassion, not only for others but for the Earth around her and the multitude of beautiful vegetation abound, she has been able to skillfully create some exquisite art with her floral designs.

I highly recommend Meaghan to anybody looking for a true artist to not only decorate their event(s), but to create living work of art that can be shared by your family and friends.

Kudos to Meaghan and her amazing work.

item.title: Comment on Honoring Beauty by Sherilyn Butler
item.dc:creator: Sherilyn Butler
item.description: HI, Meaghan! Thanks so much for reaching out today! Sorry I didn't get your message timely. I work weekdays and today had a few more errands that usual, and thus I didn't look at my phone all afternoon! I am just sitting down to take a breath! I will give you a call sometime soon to chat for a few. I love your style, and loved the flowers (even when they were 2 weeks old when I saw them LOL) that you used in your design for your friend's wedding! Take care.
item.content:encoded: HI, Meaghan! Thanks so much for reaching out today! Sorry I didn’t get your message timely. I work weekdays and today had a few more errands that usual, and thus I didn’t look at my phone all afternoon! I am just sitting down to take a breath! I will give you a call sometime soon to chat for a few. I love your style, and loved the flowers (even when they were 2 weeks old when I saw them LOL) that you used in your design for your friend’s wedding! Take care.

item.title: Comment on Sharing My Joy by Aunt Becky

item.description: So proud of you and your works...my next life event will include your designs!

item.title: Comment on Sharing My Joy by Keitha Cowen
item.dc:creator: Keitha Cowen
item.description: I love how your personality, creativity and exquisite taste come through in everything you touch. Looking forward to seeing all your future creations.
item.content:encoded: I love how your personality, creativity and exquisite taste come through in everything you touch. Looking forward to seeing all your future creations.

item.title: Comment on Sharing My Joy by Maureen Drzewicki
item.dc:creator: Maureen Drzewicki
item.description: Beautiful, Meaghan ... just like you and your beautiful story and artistry. I can't stop looking at your gorgeous arrangements and bouquets. Love them all!
item.content:encoded: Beautiful, Meaghan … just like you and your beautiful story and artistry. I can’t stop looking at your gorgeous arrangements and bouquets. Love them all!

item.title: Comment on Sharing My Joy by Maureen
item.dc:creator: Maureen
item.description: A beautiful message to share with others. Your work is inspirational!
item.content:encoded: A beautiful message to share with others. Your work is inspirational!

item.title: Comment on Sharing My Joy by Tracy Kirkconnell
item.dc:creator: Tracy Kirkconnell
item.description: Meaghan is a true artist, her floral designs are more than just an arrangement.Her good vibes pour through her work. Im looking forward to this creativity and lovliness for my next event!
item.content:encoded: Meaghan is a true artist, her floral designs are more than just an arrangement.Her good vibes pour through her work. Im looking forward to this creativity and lovliness for my next event!
